cause.description:
Most of us are trapped in a nightmare. At work, at home, in school and practically during all our wake hours, we are controlled by an addiction, an addiction known as Facebook. It ruins careers, relationships and lives! It is a threat against our civilization, societies and values!
It is time to take action. The first step is to admit that you are addicted! The second step is to Act! The struggle will be hard and demanding but we will prevail! Say No! Say No to Facebook!
1. No to Facebook!
2. A Facebook-free society!
cause.name: Facebookoholics Anonymous
